mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDY( STUDY_NUM, STUDY_NAME, STUDY_SUBJECT, STUDY_TIME, STUDY_DATE, RECRUIT_END, RECRUIT_PERSON, STATUS, STUDYROOM_NUM, MEMBER_ID ) VALUES( SELECT NVL(MAX(STUDY_NUM),0)+1 FROM STUDY, #{studyName}, #{studySubject}, #{studyTime}, SYSDATE, #{recruitEnd}, #{recruitPerson}, 'true', #{studyroomNum}, #{memberId} )
